Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) itgbg = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
%function(self) itgin = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-260) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-100) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
%function(self) itgthe = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-125) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-100) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
%function(self) itgtwo = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+190) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
%function(self) itggroove = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-75) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
%function(self) itgroxor = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+165) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+120) self:zoom(0) self:hidden(1) self:diffusealpha(1) end
